Card.Name: Cellar
Card.Rules: +1 Action\nDiscard any number of cards.\n+1 Card per card discarded.

Card.Name: Chapel
Card.Rules: Trash up to 4 cards from your hand.

Card.Name: Moat
Card.Rules: +2 Cards\n_____\nWhen another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, you are unaffected by that Attack.

Card.Name: Chancellor
Card.Rules: +2 Coins\nYou may immediately put your deck into your discard pile.

Card.Name: Village
Card.Rules: +1 Card\n+2 Actions

Card.Name: Woodcutter
Card.Rules: +1 Buy\n+2 Coins

Card.Name: Workshop
Card.Rules: Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins.

Card.Name: Bureaucrat
Card.Rules: Gain a silver card; put it on top of your deck.\nEach other player reveals a Victory card from his hand and puts it on his deck (or reveals a hand with no Victory cards).

Card.Name: Feast
Card.Rules: Trash this card. Gain a card costing up to 5 Coins.

Card.Name: Gardens
Card.Rules: Worth 1 {VP} for every 10 cards in your deck (rounded down).

Card.Name: Militia
Card.Rules: +2 Coins\nEach other player discards down to 3 cards in his hand.

Card.Name: Moneylender
Card.Rules: Trash a Copper from your hand.\nIf you do, +3 Coins.

Card.Name: Remodel
Card.Rules: Trash a card from your hand.\nGain a card costing up to 2 Coins more than the trashed card.

Card.Name: Smithy
Card.Rules: +3 Cards

Card.Name: Spy
Card.Rules: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nEach player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your chouce.

Card.Name: Thief
Card.Rules: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck.\nIf they revealed any Treasure cards, they trash one of them that you choose. You may gain any or all of these trashed cards. They discard the other revealed cards.

Card.Name: Throne Room
Card.Rules: Choose an Action card in your hand.\nPlay it twice.

Card.Name: Council Room
Card.Rules: +4 Cards\n+1 Buy\nEach other player draws a card.

Card.Name: Festival
Card.Rules: +2 Actions\n+1 Buy\n+2 Coins

Card.Name: Laboratory
Card.Rules: +2 Cards\n+1 Action

Card.Name: Library
Card.Rules: Draw until you have 7 cards in hand. You may set aside any Action cards drawn this way, as you draw them; discard the set aside cards after you finish drawing.

Card.Name: Market
Card.Rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+1 Buy
+1 Coin

Card.Name: Mine
Card.Rules: Trash a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a Treasure card costing up to 3 Coins more; put it into your hand.

Card.Name: Witch
Card.Rules: +2 Cards\nEach other player gains a Curse card.

Card.Name: Adventurer
Card.Rules: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Treasure cards. Put those Treasure cards in your hand and discard the other revealed cards.

Card.Name: Courtyard
Card.Rules: +3 Cards\nPut a card from your hand on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Pawn
Card.Rules:
Choose two: +1 Card
+1 Action
+1 Buy
+1 Coin. (The choices must be different.).

Card.Name: Secret Chamber
Card.Rules: Discard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded.\n_____\nWhen another player plays an Attack card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, +2 cards, then put 2 cards from your hand on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Great Hall
Card.Rules: +1 Card\n+1 Action\n1 {VP}

Card.Name: Masquerade
Card.Rules: +2 Card, Each player passes a card in their hand to the player on their left. You may trash a card from your hand.

Card.Name: Shanty Town
Card.Rules: +2 Actions\nReveal your hand. If you have no Action cards in hand, +2 Cards.

Card.Name: Steward
Card.Rules: Choose one: +2 Cards; or +2 Coins; or trash 2 cards from your hand.

Card.Name: Swindler
Card.Rules: +2 Coins\nEach other player trashes the top card of his deck and gains a card with the same cost that you choose.

Card.Name: Wishing Well
Card.Rules: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nName a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If it is the named card, put it in your hand.

Card.Name: Baron
Card.Rules: +1 Buy\nYou may discard an Estate card. If you do, +4 Coins. Otherwise, gain an Estate card.

Card.Name: Bridge
Card.Rules: +1 Buy\n+1 Coin\nAll cards (including cards in players' hands) cost 1 Coin less this turn, but not less than 0 Coins.

Card.Name: Conspirator
Card.Rules: +2 Coins. If you've played 3 or more Actions this turn (counting this): +1 Card, +1 Action.

Card.Name: Coppersmith
Card.Rules: Copper produces an extra 1 Coin this turn.

Card.Name: Ironworks
Card.Rules:
Gain a card costing up to 4 Coins.
If it is an...
Action card, +1 Action
Treasure card, +1 Coin
Victory card, +1 Card.

Card.Name: Mining Village
Card.Rules: +1 Card\n+2 Actions. You may trash this card immediately. If you do, +2 Coins.

Card.Name: Scout
Card.Rules: +1 Action\nReveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Victory cards into your hand. Put the other cards on top of your deck in any order.

Card.Name: Duke
Card.Rules: Worth 1 {VP} per Duchy you have.

Card.Name: Minion
Card.Rules: +1 Action\nChoose one: +2 Coins; or discard your hand, +4 Cards, and each other player with at least 5 cards in hand discards his hand and draws 4 cards.

Card.Name: Saboteur
Card.Rules: Each other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until revealing one costing 3 Coins or more. He trashes that card and may gain a card costing at most 2 Coins less than it. He discards the other revealed cards.

Card.Name: Torturer
Card.Rules: +3 Card\nEach other player chooses one: he discards 2 cards; or he gains a Curse card, putting it in his hand.

Card.Name: Trading Post
Card.Rules: Trash 2 cards from your hand.\nIf you do, gain a silver card; put it into your hand.

Card.Name: Tribute
Card.Rules:
The player to your left reveals then discards the top 2 cards of his deck.
For each differently named card revealed, if it is an...
Action Card, +2 Actions
Treasure Card, +2 Coins
Victory Card, +2 Cards

Card.Name: Upgrade
Card.Rules: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nTrash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it.

Card.Name: Harem
Card.Rules: 2 Coins\n2 {VP}

Card.Name: Nobles
Card.Rules: Choose one: +3 Cards, or +2 Actions.\n2 {VP}

Card.Name: Embargo
Card.Rules: +2 Coins\nTrash this card. Put an Embargo token on top of a Supply pile. - When a player buys a card, he gains a Curse card per Embargo token on that pile.

Card.Name: Haven
Card.Rules: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nSet aside a card from your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put it into your hand.

Card.Name: Lighthouse
Card.Rules: +1 Action\nNow and at the start of your next turn: +1 Coin. - While this is in play, when another player plays an Attack card, it doesn't affect you.

Card.Name: Native Village
Card.Rules: +2 Actions\nChoose one: Set aside the top card of your deck face down on your Native Village mat; or put all the cards from your mat into your hand. You may look at the cards on your mat at any time; return them to your deck at the end of the game.

Card.Name: Pearl Diver
Card.Rules: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nLook at the bottom card of your deck. You may put it on top.

Card.Name: Ambassador
Card.Rules: Reveal a card from your hand. Return up to 2 copies of it from your hand to the Supply. Then each other player gains a copy of it.

Card.Name: Fishing Village
Card.Rules:
+2 Actions
+1 Coin
At the start of your next turn:
+1 Action
+1 Coin.

Card.Name: Lookout
Card.Rules: +1 Action\nLook at the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash one of them. Discard one of them. Put the other one on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Smugglers
Card.Rules: Gain a copy of a card costing up to 6 Coins that the player to your right gained on his last turn.

Card.Name: Warehouse
Card.Rules: +3 Card\n+1 Action\nDiscard 3 cards.

Card.Name: Caravan
Card.Rules: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nAt the start of your next turn, +1 Card.

Card.Name: Cutpurse
Card.Rules: +2 Coins\nEach other player discards a Copper card (or reveals a hand with no Copper).

Card.Name: Island
Card.Rules: Set aside this and another card from your hand. Return them to your deck at the end of the game.\n_____\n2{VP}

Card.Name: Navigator
Card.Rules: +2 Coins\nLook at the top 5 cards of your deck. Either discard all of them, or put them back on top of your deck in any order.

Card.Name: Pirate Ship
Card.Rules: Choose one: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Treasure that you choose, discards the rest, and if anyone trashed a Treasure you take a Coin token; or, +1 Coin per Coin token you've taken with Pirate Ships this game.

Card.Name: Salvager
Card.Rules: +1 Buy\nTrash a card from your hand. +Coins equal to its cost.

Card.Name: Sea Hag
Card.Rules: Each other player discards the top card of his deck, then gains a Curse card, putting it on top of his deck.

Card.Name: Treasure Map
Card.Rules: Trash this and another copy of Treasure Map from your hand. If you do trash two Treasure Maps, gain 4 Gold cards, putting them on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Bazaar
Card.Rules: +1 Card\n+2 Actions\n+1 Coin.

Card.Name: Explorer
Card.Rules: You may reveal a Province card from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold card, putting it into your hand. Otherwise, gain a Silver card, putting it into your hand.

Card.Name: Ghost Ship
Card.Rules: +2 Cards\nEach other player with 4 or more cards in hand puts cards from his hand on top of his deck until he has 3 cards in his hand.

Card.Name: Merchant Ship
Card.Rules: Now and at the start of your next turn: +2 Coins.

Card.Name: Outpost
Card.Rules: You only draw 3 cards (instead of 5) in this turn's Clean-up phase. Take an extra turn after this one. This can't cause you to take more than two consecutive turns.

Card.Name: Tactician
Card.Rules: Discard your hand.\nIf you discarded any cards this way, then at the start of your next turn, +5 Cards, +1 Buy, and +1 Action.

Card.Name: Treasury
Card.Rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+1 Coin
When you discard this from play, if you didn't buy a Victory card this turn, you may put this on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Wharf
Card.Rules: Now and at the start of your next turn:\n+2 Cards\n+1 Buy

Card.Name: Transmute
Card.Rules:
Trash a card from your hand.
If it is an?
Action card, Gain a Duchy
Treasure card, gain a Transmute
Victory card, gain a Gold

Card.Name: Vineyard
Card.Rules: Worth 1 Victory for every 3 Action cards in your deck (rounded down).

Card.Name: Apothecary
Card.Rules: +1 Card, +1 Action\nReveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put the revealed Coppers and Potions into your hand. Put the other cards back on top in any order.

Card.Name: Herbalist
Card.Rules: +1 Buy\n+1 Coin\nWhen you discard this from play, you may put one of your Treasures from play on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Scrying Pool
Card.Rules: +1 Action\nEach player (including you) reveals the top card of his deck and either discards it or puts it back, your choice. Then reveal cards from the top of your deck until revealing one that isn't an Action.\nPut all of your revealed cards into your hand.

Card.Name: University
Card.Rules: +2 Actions\nYou may gain an Action card costing up to 5 Coins.

Card.Name: Alchemist
Card.Rules: +2 Cards\n+1 Action\nWhen you discard this from play, you may put this on top of your deck if you have a Potion in play.

Card.Name: Familiar
Card.Rules: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nEach other player gains a curse.

Card.Name: Philosopher's Stone
Card.Rules: When you play this, count your deck and discard pile.\nWorth 1 Coin per 5 cards total between them (rounded down).

Card.Name: Golem
Card.Rules: Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal 2 Action cards other than Golem Cards.\nDiscard the other cards, then play the Action cards in either order.

Card.Name: Potion
Card.Rules: Worth 1 Potion.

Card.Name: Apprentice
Card.Rules:
+1 Action
Trash a card from your hand.
+1 Card per Coin it costs.
+2 Cards if it has Potion in its cost.

Card.Name: Possession
Card.Rules: The player to your left takes an extra turn after this one, in which you can see all cards he can and make all decisions for him.\nAny cards he would gain on that turn, you gain instead; any cards of his that are trashed are set aside and returned to his discard pile at end of turn.

Card.Name: Loan
Card.Rules: Worth 1 Coin.\nWhen you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard it or trash it. Discard the other cards.

Card.Name: Trade Route
Card.Rules:
+1 Buy
+1 Coin per token on the Trade Route mat.
Trash a card from your hand.
_____
Setup: Put a token on each Victory card Supply pile. When a card is gained from that pile, move the token to the Trade Route mat.

Card.Name: Watchtower
Card.Rules: Draw until you have 6 cards in hand.\n_____\nWhen you gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, either trash that card, or put it on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Bishop
Card.Rules:
1
+1 {VP}
Trash a card from your hand. +{VP} equal to half its cost in coins, rounded down.
Each other player may trash a card from his hand.

Card.Name: Monument
Card.Rules: +2 Coins; +1 {VP}

Card.Name: Quarry
Card.Rules: Worth 1 Coin.\n_____\nWhile this is in play, Action cards cost 2 less, but not less than 0.

Card.Name: Talisman
Card.Rules: Worth 1 Coin.\n_____\nWhile this is in play, when you buy a card costing 4 or less that is not a Victory card, gain a copy of it.

Card.Name: Worker's Village
Card.Rules: +1 Card\n+2 Actions\n+1 Buy

Card.Name: City
Card.Rules: +1 Card\n+2 Actions\nIf there are one or more empty Supply piles, +1 Card. If there are two or more, +1 Coin and +1 Buy.

Card.Name: Contraband
Card.Rules: Worth 3 Coins.\n+1 Buy\nWhen you play this, the player to your left names a card. You can't buy that card this turn.

Card.Name: Counting House
Card.Rules: Look through your discard pile, reveal any number of Copper cards from it, and put them into your hand.

Card.Name: Mint
Card.Rules: You may reveal a Treasure card from your hand. Gain a copy of it.\n_____\nWhen you buy this, trash all Treasures you have in play.

Card.Name: Mountebank
Card.Rules: +2 Coins\nEach other player may discard a Curse. If he doesn't, he gains a Curse and a Copper.

Card.Name: Rabble
Card.Rules: +3 Cards\nEach other player reveals the top 3 cards of his deck, discards the revealed Actions and Treasures, and puts the rest back on top in any order he chooses.

Card.Name: Royal Seal
Card.Rules: Worth 2 Coins.\n_____\nWhile this is in play, when you gain a card, you may put that card on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Vault
Card.Rules: +2 Cards\nDiscard any number of cards. +1 Coin per card discarded.\nEach other player may discard 2 cards. If he does, he draws a card.

Card.Name: Venture
Card.Rules: Worth 1 Coin.\nWhen you play this, reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Treasure. Discard the other cards. Play that Treasure.

Card.Name: Goons
Card.Rules:
+1 Buy
+2 Coins
Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.
_____
While this is in play, when you buy a card, +1 {VP}.

Card.Name: Grand Market
Card.Rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+1 Buy
+2 Coins
_____
You can't buy this if you have any Copper in play.

Card.Name: Hoard
Card.Rules: Worth 2 Coins.\n_____\nWhile this is in play, when you buy a Victory card, gain a Gold.

Card.Name: Bank
Card.Rules: Worth ? Coins.\nWhen you play this, it's worth 1 Coin per Treasure card you have in play (counting this).

Card.Name: Expand
Card.Rules: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 3 more than the trashed card.

Card.Name: Forge
Card.Rules: Trash any number of cards from your hand. Gain a card with cost exactly equal to the total cost in coins of the trashed cards.

Card.Name: King's Court
Card.Rules: You may choose an Action card in your hand. Play it three times.

Card.Name: Peddler
Card.Rules: +1 Card; +1 Action; +2 Coin\n_____\nDuring your Buy phase, this costs 2 less per Action card you have in play, but not less than 0.

Card.Name: Platinum
Card.Rules: +5 Coins.

Card.Name: Bag of Gold
Card.Rules: +1 Action\nGain a Gold, putting it on top of your deck.\n(This is not in the Supply.)

Card.Name: Diadem
Card.Rules: Worth $2.\nWhen you play this, +$1 per unused Action you have (Action, not Action card).\n(This is not in the Supply.)

Card.Name: Followers
Card.Rules: +2 Cards\nGain an Estate. Each other player gains a Curse and discards down to 3 cards in hand.\n(This is not in the Supply.)

Card.Name: Princess
Card.Rules:
+1 Buy
_____
While this is in play, cards cost $2 less, but not less than $0.
(This is not in the Supply.)

Card.Name: Trusty Steed
Card.Rules: Choose two: +2 Cards; or +2 Actions; or +$2; or gain 4 Silvers and put your deck into your discard pile.\n(This is not in the Supply.)

Card.Name: Hamlet
Card.Rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
You may discard a card; If you do +1 Action.
You may discard a card; If you do +1 Buy

Card.Name: Fortune Teller
Card.Rules: +2 Coin\nEach other player reveals cards from the top of his deck until he reveals a Victory of Curse card. He puts it on top and discards the other revealed cards.

Card.Name: Menagerie
Card.Rules:
+1 Action
Reveal your hand.
If there are no duplicate cards in it, +3 Cards.
Otherwise, +1 Card.

Card.Name: Farming Village
Card.Rules: +2 Actions\nReveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal an Action or Treasure card. Put that card into your hand and discard the other cards.

Card.Name: Horse Traders
Card.Rules:
+1 Buy
+3 Coin
Discard 2 Cards
_____
When another player plays an Attack card, you may set this aside from your hand. If you do, then at the start of your next turn, +1 Card and return this to your hand.

Card.Name: Remake
Card.Rules: Do this twice: Trash a card from your hand then gain a card costing exactly 1 more than the trashed card.

Card.Name: Tournament
Card.Rules: +1 Action\nEach player may reveal a Province from his hand. If you do, discard it and gain a Prize (from the Prize pile) or a Duchy, putting it on top of your deck. If no-one else does, +1 Card +1 Coin.

Card.Name: Young Witch
Card.Rules:
+2 Cards
Discard 2 cards. Each other player may reveal a Bane card from his hand.
If he doesn't, he gains a Curse.
_____
Setup: Add an extra Kingdom card pile costing 2 or 3 to the Supply. Cards from that pile are Bane cards.

Card.Name: Harvest
Card.Rules: Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck, then discard them. +1 Coin per differently named card revealed.

Card.Name: Horn of Plenty
Card.Rules: 0 Coins\nWhen you play this, gain a card costing up to 1 Coin per differently named card you have in play, counting this. If it's a Victory card, trash this.

Card.Name: Hunting Party
Card.Rules: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nReveal your hand. Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a card that isn't in a duplicate of one in your hand and discard the rest.

Card.Name: Jester
Card.Rules: +2 Coins\nEach other player discards the top card of his deck. If it's a Victory card he gains a Curse. Otherwise he gains a copy of the discarded card or you do, your choice.

Card.Name: Fairgrounds
Card.Rules: Worth 2 VP for every 5 differently named cards in your deck (rounded down)

Card.Name: Crossroads
Card.Rules: Reveal your hand.\n+1 Card per Victory card revealed. If this is the first time you played a Crossroads this turn, +3 Actions.\n

Card.Name: Duchess
Card.Rules:
+2 Coins
Each player (including you) looks at the top card of his deck, and discards it or puts it back.
_____
In games using this, when you gain a Duchy, you may gain a Duchess.

Card.Name: Fool's Gold
Card.Rules:
If this is the first time you played a Fool's Gold this turn, this is worth 1 coin, otherwise it's worth 4 coins.
_____
When another player gains a Province, you may trash this from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold, putting it on your deck.

Card.Name: Develop
Card.Rules: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly 1 coin more than it and a card costing exactly 1 less than it, in either order, putting them on top of your deck.\n

Card.Name: Oasis
Card.Rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+$1
Discard a card.

Card.Name: Oracle
Card.Rules: Each player (including you) reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, and you choose one: either he discards them, or he puts them back on top in an order he chooses.\n+2 Cards\n

Card.Name: Scheme
Card.Rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
At the start of Clean-up this turn, you may choose an Action card you have in play. If you discard it from play this turn, put it on your deck.

Card.Name: Tunnel
Card.Rules:
2 VP [large shield]
_____
When you discard this other than during a Clean-up phase, you may reveal it. If you do, gain a Gold.

Card.Name: Jack of all Trades
Card.Rules:
Gain a Silver.
Look at the top card of your deck; discard it or put it back.
Draw until you have 5 cards in hand.
You may trash a card from your hand that is not a Treasure.

Card.Name: Noble Brigand
Card.Rules: +1 Coin\nWhen you buy this or play it, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes a revealed Silver or Gold you choose, and discards the rest. If he didn't reveal a Treasure, he gains a Copper. You gain the trashed cards.\n

Card.Name: Nomad Camp
Card.Rules:
+1 Buy
+2 Coins
_____
When you gain this, put it on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Silk Road
Card.Rules: Worth 1 VP for every 4 Victory cards in your deck (round down).\n

Card.Name: Spice Merchant
Trader
Card.Rules:
Trash a card from your hand. Gain a number of Silvers equal to its cost in coins.
_____
When you would gain a card, you may reveal this from your hand. If you do, instead, gain a silver.

Card.Name: Cache
Card.Rules:
Worth 3 coins
_____
When you gain this, gain two Coppers.

Card.Name: Cartographer
Card.Rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Discard any number of them. Put the rest back on top in any order.

Card.Name: Embassy
Card.Rules:
+5 Cards
Discard 3 cards.
_____
When you gain this, each other player gains a Silver.

Card.Name: Haggler
Card.Rules:
+2 Coins
_____
While this is in play, when you buy a card, gain a card costing less than it that is not a Victory card.

Card.Name: Highway
Card.Rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
_____
While this is in play, cards cost $1 less, but not less than $0.

Card.Name: Ill-Gotten Gains
Card.Rules:
Worth 1 Coin
When you play this, you may gain a Copper, putting it into your hand.
_____
When you gain this, each other player gains a Curse.

Card.Name: Inn
Card.Rules:
+2 Cards
+2 Actions
Discard 2 cards.
_____
When you gain this, look through your discard pile (including this), reveal any number of Action cards from it, and shuffle them into your deck.

Card.Name: Mandarin
Card.Rules:
+3 coins
Put a card from your hand on top of your deck.
_____
When you gain this, put all Treasures you have in play on top of your deck in any order.

Card.Name: Margrave
Card.Rules:
+3 Cards
+1 Buy
Each other player draws a card, then discards down to 3 cards in hand.

Card.Name: Stables
Card.Rules: You may discard a Treasure. If you do, +3 Cards and +1 Action.\n

Card.Name: Border Village
Card.Rules:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
_____
When you gain this, gain a card costing less than this.

Card.Name: Farmland
Card.Rules:
2 VP
_____
When you buy this, trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing exactly $2 more than the trashed card.

Card.Name: Black Market
Card.Rules: +2 Coins, Reveal the top 3 cards of the Black Market deck. You may buy one of them immediately. Put the unbought cards on the bottom of the Black Market deck in any order.\n(Before the game, make a Black Market deck out of one copy of each Kingdom card no

Card.Name: Envoy
Card.Rules: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one for you to discard. Draw the rest.\n

Card.Name: Walled Village
Card.Rules:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
_____
At the start of Clean-up, if you have this and no more than one other Action card in play, you may put this on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Governor
Card.Rules: +1 Action\nChoose one; you get the version in parentheses: Each player gets +1 (+3) Cards; or each player gains a Silver (Gold); or each player may trash a card from his hand and gain a card costing exactly $1 ($2) more.\n

Card.Name: Stash
Card.Rules: Worth 2 Coins. When you shuffle, you may put this anywhere in your deck.\n

Card.Name: Abandoned Mine
Card.Rules: +1 Coin

Card.Name: Altar
Card.Rules: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to 5 Coins.

Card.Name: Armory
Card.Rules: Gain a card costing up to 4, putting it on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Band of Misfits
Card.Rules: Play this as if it were an Action card in the Supply costing less than it that you choose.\nThis is that card until it leaves play.

Card.Name: Bandit Camp
Card.Rules: +1 Card\n+2 Actions\nGain a Spoils from the Spoils pile.

Card.Name: Beggar
Card.Rules: Gain 3 Coppers, putting them into your hand\n_____\nWhen another player plays an attack card, you may discard this. If you do, gain two Silvers putting one on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Catacombs
Card.Rules: Look at the top 3 cards of you deck. Choose one: Put them into your hand; or discard them and +3 Cards.\n_____\nWhen you trash this, gain a cheaper card.

Card.Name: Count
Card.Rules: Choose one: Discard 2 cards; or put a card from your hand on top of your deck; or gain a Copper.\nChoose one: +3 Coins; or trash your hand; or gain a Duchy.

Card.Name: Counterfeit
Card.Rules: +1 Coin\n+1 Buy\nWhen you play this, you may play a Treasure from your hand twice. If you do, trash that Treasure.

Card.Name: Cultist
Card.Rules:
+2 Cards
Each other player gains a Ruins. You may play a Cultist from your hand.
_____
When you trash this, +3 Cards.

Card.Name: Death Cart
Card.Rules:
+5 Coins
You may trash an action card from your hand. If you don't, trash this.
_____
When you gain this, gain 2 Ruins

Card.Name: Dame Anna
Card.Rules: You may trash up to 2 cards from your hand.\nEach other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Card.Name: Dame Josephine
Card.Rules: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.\n2 {VP}

Card.Name: Dame Molly
Card.Rules: +2 Actions\nEach other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Card.Name: Dame Natalie
Card.Rules: You may gain a card costing up to 3 Coins.\nEach other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Card.Name: Dame Sylvia
Card.Rules: +2 Coins\nEach other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Card.Name: Feodum
Card.Rules: Worth 1 Victory for every 3 Silvers in your deck (round down).\n_____\nWhen you trash this, gain 3 Silvers.

Card.Name: Forager
Card.Rules:
+1 Action
+1 Buy
Trash a card from your hand.
+1 Coin per differently named Treasure in the trash.

Card.Name: Fortress
Card.Rules:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
_____
When you trash this, put it into your hand.

Card.Name: Graverobber
Card.Rules: Choose one: Gain a card from the trash costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, putting it on top of your deck; or trash an Action card from your hand and gain a card costing up to 3 Coins more than it.

Card.Name: Hermit
Card.Rules: Look through your discard pile. You may trash a card from your discard pile or hand that is not a Treasure. Gain a card costing up to 3 Coins.\n_____\nWhen you discard this from play, if you did not buy any cards this turn, trash this and gain a Madman from the Madman pile.

Card.Name: Hovel
Card.Rules: When you buy a Victory card, you may trash this from your hand.\n_____\n(This is not in the supply.)

Card.Name: Hunting Grounds
Card.Rules: +4 Cards\n_____\nWhen you trash this, gain a Duchy or 3 Estates.

Card.Name: Ironmonger
Card.Rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Reveal the top card of your deck; you may discard it. Either way, if it is an...
Action card, +1 Action
Treasure card, +1 Coin
Victory card, +1 Card

Card.Name: Junk Dealer
Card.Rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+1 Coin
Trash a card from your hand.

Card.Name: Knights
Card.Rules: Shuffle the Knight pile before each game with it. Keep it face down except for the top card, which is the only one that can be bought or gained.

Card.Name: Madman
Card.Rules: +2 Actions\nReturn this to the Madman pile. If you do, +1 Card per card in your hand.\n(This is not in the supply.)

Card.Name: Marauder
Card.Rules: Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile. Each other player gains a Ruins.

Card.Name: Market Square
Card.Rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+1 Buy
_____
When one of your cards is trashed, you may discard this from your hand. If you do, gain a Gold.

Card.Name: Mercenary
Card.Rules: You may trash 2 cards from your hand.\nIf you do, +2 Cards, +2 Coins, and each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.\n(This is not in the supply.)

Card.Name: Mystic
Card.Rules:
+1 Action
+2 Coins
Name a card.
Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's the named card, put it into your hand.

Card.Name: Necropolis
Card.Rules: +2 Actions\n_____\n(This is not in the supply.)

Card.Name: Overgrown Estate
Card.Rules:
0 Victory
_____
When you trash this, +1 Card.
_____
(This is not in the supply.)

Card.Name: Pillage
Card.Rules: Trash this. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand reveals his hand and discards a card that you choose.\nGain 2 Spoils from the Spoils pile.

Card.Name: Poor House
Card.Rules: +4 Coins\nReveal your hand. -1 Coin per Treasure card in your hand, to a minimum of 0 Coins.

Card.Name: Procession
Card.Rules: You may play an Action card from your hand twice. Trash it. Gain an Action card costing exactly 1 Coin more than it.

Card.Name: Rats
Card.Rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Gain a Rats. Trash a card from your hand other than a Rats (or reveal a hand of all Rats).
_____
When you trash this, +1 Card.

Card.Name: Rebuild
Card.Rules: +1 Action\nName a card. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Victory card that is not the named card. Discard the other cards. Trash the Victory card and gain a Victory card costing up to 3 Coins more than it.

Card.Name: Rogue
Card.Rules: +2 Coins\nIf there are any cards in the trash costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, gain one of them. Otherwise, each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest.

Card.Name: Ruined Library
Card.Rules: +1 Card

Card.Name: Ruined Market
Card.Rules: +1 Buy

Card.Name: Ruined Village
Card.Rules: +1 Action

Card.Name: Ruins
Card.Rules: If any Kingdom card has the type Looter, add the Ruins pile to this game. Shuffle the Ruins cards, then count 10 per player after the first. Put the pile face down with the top card face up.

Card.Name: Sage
Card.Rules: +1 Action\nReveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal one costing 3 Coins or more. Put that card into your hand and discard the rest.

Card.Name: Scavenger
Card.Rules: +1 Coins\nYou may put your deck into your discard pile. Look through your discard pile and put one card from it on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Sir Bailey
Card.Rules: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nEach other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Card.Name: Sir Destry
Card.Rules: +2 Cards\nEach other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Card.Name: Sir Martin
Card.Rules: +2 Buys\nEach other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Card.Name: Sir Michael
Card.Rules: Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.\nEach other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.

Card.Name: Sir Vander
Card.Rules: Each other player reveals the top 2 cards of his deck, trashes one of them costing from 3 Coins to 6 Coins, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this card.\n_____\nWhen you trash this, gain a Gold.

Card.Name: Spoils
Card.Rules: 3 Coins\nWhen you play this, return it to the Spoils pile.\n(This is not in the supply.)

Card.Name: Squire
Card.Rules:
+1 Coin
Choose one: +2 Actions; or +2 Buys; or gain a Silver.
_____

Card.Name: Storeroom
Card.Rules:
+1 Buy
Discard any number of cards.
+1 Card be card discarded.
Discard any numebr of cards.
+1 Coin per card discarded the second time.

Card.Name: Survivors
Card.Rules: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Discard them or put them back in any order.

Card.Name: Urchin
Card.Rules: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nEach other player discards down to 4 cards in hand

Card.Name: Vagrant
Card.Rules: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nReveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Curse, Ruins, Shelter, or Victory card, put it into your hand.

Card.Name: Wandering Minstrel
Card.Rules: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nReveal the top 3 cards from your deck. Put the Actions back on top in any order and discard the rest.

Card.Name: Shelters
Card.Rules: The Shelter cards replace starting Estates. Each player's starting deck is seven Coppers, a Hovel, a Necropolis, and an Overgrown Estate.

Card.Name: Advisor
Card.Rules: +1 Action\nReveal the top 3 cards of your deck. The player to your left chooses one of them. Discard that card. Put the other cards into your hand.

Card.Name: Baker
Card.Rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Take a Coin token.
_____
Setup: Each player takes a Coin token.

Card.Name: Butcher
Card.Rules: Take 2 Coin tokens. You may trash a card from your hand and then pay any number of Coin tokens. If you did trash a card, gain a card with a cost of up to the cost of the trashed card plus the number of Coin tokens you paid.

Card.Name: Candlestick Maker
Card.Rules: +1 Action\n+1 Buy\nTake a Coin token.

Card.Name: Doctor
Card.Rules: Name a card. Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Trash the matches. Put the rest back on top in any order.\nWhen you buy this, you may overpay for it. For each 1 Coin you overpaid, look at the top card of your deck, trash it, discard it, or put it back.

Card.Name: Herald
Card.Rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Reveal the top card of your deck. If it is an Action, play it.
_____
When you buy this, you may overpay for it. For each 1 Coin you overpaid, look through your discard pile and put a card from it on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Journeyman
Card.Rules: Name a card. Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal 3 cards that are not the named card. Put those cards into your hand and discard the rest.

Card.Name: Masterpiece
Card.Rules: +1 Coin\n_____\nWhen you buy this, you may overpay for it. If you do, gain a Silver per 1 Coin you overpaid.

Card.Name: Merchant Guild
Card.Rules:
+1 Buy
+1 Coin
_____
While this is in play, when you buy a card, take a Coin token.

Card.Name: Plaza
Card.Rules: +1 Card\n+2 Actions\nYou may discard a treasure card. If you do, take a Coin token.

Card.Name: Soothsayer
Card.Rules: Gain a Gold. Each other player gains a Curse. Each other player who did draws a card.

Card.Name: Stonemason
Card.Rules: Trash a card from your hand. Gain 2 cards each costing less than it.\n_____\nWhen you buy this, you may overpay for it. If you do, gain 2 Action cards each costing the amount you overpaid.

Card.Name: Taxman
Card.Rules: You may trash a Treasure from your hand. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand discards a copy of it (or reveals a hand without it). Gain a Treasure card costing up to 3 Coins more than the trashed card, putting it on top of you deck.

Card.Name: Prince
Card.Rules: You may set this aside. If you do, set aside an Action card from your hand costing up to $4. At the start of each of your turns, play that Action, setting it aside again when you discard it from play. (Stop playing it if you fail to set it aside on a turn you play it.)

Card.Name: Copper
Card.Rules: +1 Coin.

Card.Name: Silver
Card.Rules: +2 Coins.

Card.Name: Gold
Card.Rules: +3 Coins.

Card.Name: Alms
Card.Rules: Once per turn: If you have no Treasures in play, gain a card costing up to $4.

Card.Name: Amulet
Card.Rules: Now and at the start of your next turn, choose one: +$1; or trash a card from your hand; or gain a Silver.

Card.Name: Artificer
Card.Rules:
+1 Action
+1 Card
+$1
Discard any number of cards. You may gain a card costing exactly $1 per card discarded, putting it on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Ball
Card.Rules: Take your -$1 token. Gain 2 cards each costing up to $4.

Card.Name: Bonfire
Card.Rules: Trash up to 2 cards you have in play.

Card.Name: Borrow
Card.Rules: +1 Buy\nOnce per turn: If your -1 Card token isn't on your deck, put it there and +$1.

Card.Name: Bridge Troll
Card.Rules:
Each other player takes his -$1 token. Now and at the start of your next turn:
+1 Buy
_____
While this is in play, cards cost $1 less on your turns, but not less than $0.

Card.Name: Caravan Guard
Card.Rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
At the start of your next turn, +$1
When another player plays an Attack card, you may play this from your hand. (+1 Action has no effect if it's not your turn.)

Card.Name: Champion
Card.Rules: +1 Action\nFor the rest of the game, when another player plays an Attack, it doesn't affect you, and when you play an Action, +1 Action.\n(This stays in play. This is not in the Supply.)

Card.Name: Coin of the Realm
Card.Rules: $1\nWhen you play this, put it on your Tavern mat.\nDirectly after resolving an Action, you may call this, for +2 Actions.

Card.Name: Disciple
Card.Rules: You may play an Action card from your hand twice. Gain a copy of it.\nWhen you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Teacher.\n(This is not in the Supply)

Card.Name: Distant Lands
Card.Rules: Put this on your Tavern mat.\nWorth 4 {VP} if on your Tavern mat at the end of the game (otherwise worth 0 {VP}).

Card.Name: Dungeon
Card.Rules: +1 Action\nNow and at the start of your next turn: +2 Cards, then discard 2 cards.

Card.Name: Duplicate
Card.Rules: Put this on your Tavern mat.\n_____\nWhen you gain a card costing up to $6, you may call this, to gain a copy of that card.

Card.Name: Expedition
Card.Rules: Draw 2 extra cards for your next hand.

Card.Name: Ferry
Card.Rules: Move your -$2 cost token to an Action Supply pile (cards from that pile cost $2 less on your turns, but not less than $0.

Card.Name: Fugitive
Card.Rules:
+2 Cards
+1 Action
Discard a card.
_____
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Disciple.
(This is not in the Supply)

Card.Name: Gear
Card.Rules: +2 Cards\nSet aside up to 2 cards from your hand face down. At the start of your next turn, put them into your hand.

Card.Name: Giant
Card.Rules: Turn your Journey token over (it starts face up). If it's face down, +$1. If it's face up, +$5, and each other player reveals the top card of his deck, trashes it if it costs from $3 to $6, and otherwise discards it and gains a Curse.

Card.Name: Guide
Card.Rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Put this on your Tavern mat.
_____
At the start of your turn, you may call this, to discard your hand and draw 5 cards.

Card.Name: Haunted Woods
Card.Rules: Until you next turn, when any other player buys a card, he puts his hand on top of his deck in any order.\nAt the start of your next turn:\n+3 Cards

Card.Name: Hero
Card.Rules:
+$2
Gain a Treasure.
_____
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Champion.
(This is not in the Supply)

Card.Name: Hireling
Card.Rules: At the start of each of your turns for the rest of the game:\n+1 Card\n(This stays in play)

Card.Name: Inheritance
Card.Rules: Once per game: Set aside a non-Victory Action card from the Supply costing up to $4. Move your Estate token to it (your Estates gain the abilities and types of that card).

Card.Name: Lost Arts
Card.Rules: Move your +1 Action token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Action).

Card.Name: Lost City
Card.Rules:
+2 Cards
+2 Actions
_____
When you gain this, each other player draws a card.

Card.Name: Magpie
Card.Rules: +1 Card\n+1 Action\nReveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Treasure, put it into your hand. If it's an Action or Victory card, gain a Magpie.

Card.Name: Messenger
Card.Rules:
+1 Buy
+$2
You may put your deck into your discard pile.
_____
When this is your first buy in a turn, gain a card costing up to $4, and each other player gains a copy of it.

Card.Name: Miser
Card.Rules: Choose one: Put a Copper from your hand onto your Tavern mat; or +$1 per Copper on your Tavern mat.

Card.Name: Mission
Card.Rules: Once per turn: If the previous turn wasn't yours, take another turn after this one, in which you can't buy cards.

Card.Name: Page
Card.Rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
_____
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Treasure Hunter

Card.Name: Pathfinding
Card.Rules: Move your +1 Card token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Card).

Card.Name: Peasant
Card.Rules:
+1 Buy
+$1
_____
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Soldier.

Card.Name: Pilgrimage
Card.Rules: Once per turn: Turn your Journey token over (it starts face up); then if it's face up, choose up to 3 differently named cards you have in play and gain a copy of each.

Card.Name: Plan
Card.Rules: Move your Trashing token to an Action Supply pile (when you buy a card from that pile, you may trash a card from your hand.)

Card.Name: Port
Card.Rules:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
_____
When you buy this, gain another Port.

Card.Name: Quest
Card.Rules: You may discard an Attack, two Curses, or six cards. If you do, gain a Gold.

Card.Name: Raid
Card.Rules: Gain a Silver per Silver you have in play. Each other player puts his -1 Card token on his deck.

Card.Name: Ranger
Card.Rules: +1 Buy\nTurn your Journey token over (it starts face up). If it's face up, +5 Cards.

Card.Name: Ratcatcher
Card.Rules:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Put this on your Tavern mat.
At the start of your turn, you may call this to trash a card from your hand.

Card.Name: Raze
Card.Rules: +1 Action\nTrash this or a card from your hand. Look at a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the cost in $_ of the trashed card. Put one into your hand and discard the rest.

Card.Name: Relic
Card.Rules: $2\nWhen you play this, each other player puts his -1 Card token on his deck.

Card.Name: Royal Carriage
Card.Rules:
+1 Action
Put this on your Tavern mat.
_____
Directly after resolving an Action, if it's still in play, you may call this, to replay that Action.

Card.Name: Save
Card.Rules: +1 Buy\nOnce per turn: Set aside a card from your hand, and put it into your hand at end of turn (after drawing).

Card.Name: Scouting Party
Card.Rules: +1 Buy\nLook at the top 5 cards of your deck. Discard 3 of them and put the rest back on top of your deck in any order.

Card.Name: Seaway
Card.Rules: Gain an Action card costing up to $4. Move your +1 Buy token to its pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +1 Buy).

Card.Name: Soldier
Card.Rules:
+$2
+$1 per other Attack you have in play. Each other player with 4 or more cards in hand discards a card.
_____
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Fugitive.
(This is not in the Supply)

Card.Name: Storyteller
Card.Rules: +1 Action\n+1 $1\nPlay up to 3 Treasures from your hand. Pay all of your $_; +1 Card per $_ paid.

Card.Name: Swamp Hag
Card.Rules: Until your next turn, when any other player buys a card, he gains a Curse.\nAt the start of your next turn:\n+$3

Card.Name: Teacher
Card.Rules:
Put this on your Tavern mat.
_____
At the start of your turn, you may call this, to move your +1 Card, +1 Action, +1 Buy, or +$1 token to an Action Supply pile you have no token on (when you play a card from that pile you first get that bonus).
(This is not in the Supply)

Card.Name: Trade
Card.Rules: Trash up to 2 cards from your hand.\nGain a Silver per card you trashed.

Card.Name: Training
Card.Rules: Move your +$1 token to an Action Supply pile (when you play a card from that pile, you first get +$1).

Card.Name: Transmogrify
Card.Rules:
+1 Action
Put this on your Tavern mat.
_____
At the start of your turn, you may call this, to trash a card from your hand, gain a card costing up to $1 more than it, and put that card into your hand.

Card.Name: Travelling Fair
Card.Rules: +2 Buys\nWhen you gain a card this turn, you may put it on top of your deck.

Card.Name: Treasure Hunter
Card.Rules:
+1 Action
+$1
Gain a Silver per card the player to your right gained in his last turn.
_____
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Warrior.
(This is not in the Supply)

Card.Name: Treasure Trove
Card.Rules: $2\nWhen you play this, gain a Gold and a Copper.

Card.Name: Warrior
Card.Rules:
+2 Cards
For each Traveller you have in play (including this) each other player discards the top card of his deck and trashes it if it costs $3 or $4.
_____
When you discard this from play, you may exchange it for a Hero.
(This is not in the Supply)

Card.Name: Wine Merchant
Card.Rules:
+1 Buy
+$4
Put this on your Tavern mat.
_____
At the end of your Buy phase, if you have at least $2 unspent, you may discard this from your Tavern mat.

Card.Name: Prizes
Card.Rules: Prizes are a set of five differently-named unique cards that are not part of the supply, but can be gained by playing Tournament. They include Bag of Gold, Diadem, Followers, Princess, and Trusty Steed.
